property.display: Drift Compensation Method (Valid only if Drift Compensation is enabled above)
Steady state drift compensation rate, drift compensation will be applied per n scans

constraint.display: Value must be greater than or equal to 2

property.display: Startup drift compensation rate (Should be less than the steady state drift compensation rate)

constraint.display: Startup drift compensation rate must be greater than 0

property.display: Channel release compensation rate (Should be less than the steady state drift compensation rate)

constraint.display: Channel release compensation rate must be greater than 0

property.display: Default filter depth (used in sensor count filter provided by driver)

constraint.display: Value should be between 0 and 8 inclusive, (0 means no filtering)

property.display: Runtime rate of tuning of sensor values (if drift compensation is used this value is overridden to be twice the rate of the steady state drift compensation)

constraint.display: Value must be between 10 and 1000 inclusive

property.display: Perform auto-tune and drift compensation only when all channels are untouched

constraint.display: Value must be greater than or equal to 1
Value must be less than than or equal to 324
Unique name required for each instance
Requires CTSU Interrupt (Write) enabled in ICU
Requires CTSU Interrupt (Read) enabled in ICU
Requires CTSU Interrupt (End) enabled in ICU
Name must be a valid C symbol
Name must be a valid C symbol
Name must be a valid C symbol

property.display: Tuning a board with a Slider or Wheel

config.content:
/** This file will only be used when the CapTouch Tuning is performed. The file will be generated when the CTSU module is added for normal usage also but will have no effect in that case */
#define CTSU_TUNING_BUTTONS (${module.driver.ctsu_tuning.button}) #define CTSU_TUNING_SLIDERS_WHEELS (${module.driver.ctsu_tuning.wheel_slider}) #define CTSU_TUNING_MODE (${module.driver.ctsu_tuning.mode}) /* Define the options for CTSU_TUNING_MODE above */ #define CTSU_MODE_SELF (0) #define CTSU_MODE_MUTUAL (1)
